member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_SCROLL_MODE
member.summary: Specifies how text appears when the parent element is scrolled.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_SCROLL_MODE.MF_TIMED_TEXT_SCROLL_MODE_POP_ON
member.summary: Text pops on when the parent element is scrolled.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_SCROLL_MODE.MF_TIMED_TEXT_SCROLL_MODE_ROLL_UP
member.summary: Text rolls up when the parent element is scrolled.
